name: Shakil Tanvir
headline: Building reliable embedded systems that bridge research and real-world impact.
subtitle: Secure hardware wallets (ATECC608A), STM32 ignition, smart energy (DLMS/COSEM, STS), defense ROVs, agritech automation.
about: Embedded Systems & Robotics Engineer. Founder of Creative Factory. I turn research into robust field devices.
